extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Access to Authorized Personnel
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that only authorized personnel or people in the company of authorized personnel have access to the Frauscher Diagnostic System FDS001.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Frauscher Diagnostic System FDS001 connected to a network of category 3?

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Additional Protective Measures
extracted_playbook.description: Add additional protective measures if the Frauscher Diagnostic System FDS001 is connected to a network of category 3 (according to EN 50159:2010).

cve_id: Diagnostic System FDS101 for FAdC/FAdCi, <= 1.3.3 Mitigation
affected_products: Frauscher Diagnostic System FDS001 for FAdC R1 and FAdCi R1 <= 1.3.3
